jù: (предлог) в соответствии с, согласно

chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The man set his finger firmly on the map and said "Here is where they reside, I am certain of it" as he slams a certificate of residence on the table.
humanum_short_description_en: "Shuowen": "According, stick holding also. Sound from the hand." See "豦".
humanum_short_description: 《說文》：「據，杖持也。從手豦聲。」參見「豦」。

據 (Simplified: 据)
Pinyin: jù
English Definition: according to; to act in accordance with; to depend on; to seize; to occupy
Total strokes: 16; Radical: 手
Pictophonetic: 豦 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 豦 [ jù ] wild boar; to fight
Example Words:
據說 [ jù shuō ]: it is said that; reportedly
More: 據* | *據 | *據*

據據RS
据据 		拠 occupy, take possession of, base, position, foothold
  • hand 扌 occupying a place 居/処 or base of a wild boar 豦
(Simplified: 据)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 豦 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 扌 [ shǒu ] hand
    • 豦 [ jù ] wild boar; to fight
①憑依、倚仗：據點。據險固守。
②佔有：竊據。盤據。據爲己有。
③可以用做證明的事物：字據。證據。單據。論據。契據。言之有據。
④按照：據實。據稱。依據。據事直書。
據說 [ jù shuō ]: it is said that; reportedly
(Simplified: 据)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 豦 indicates the sound; 扌 (hand) conveys the meaning.
HSK: 3
Chinese: To handle tigers or pigs with your fingers you need a certificate.  
Meaning: certificate
Hanzi: 据
Story: The man set his finger firmly on the map and said "Here is where they reside, I am certain of it" as he slams a certificate of residence on the table.
Kind: traditional

據字的基本解释

據
jù

據
jū
均见“据”。

據字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jù］
［《廣韻》居御切，去御，見。］
“据2”的繁体字。
(1)依靠，依从。
(2)依照，根据。
(3)定，安。
(4)按着。
(5)证据。
(6)指凭据。即用作证明的书面文件。
(7)占有，占据，处于。
(8)抵拒。
(9)跨；蹲。
(10)确实。
(11)古印度长度单位。约相当于晋时的十里。
(12)姓。明有据成。见《续通志·氏族七》。
[②]［jǐ］
搏击；爪持。

據字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　據； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页459第12
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?居御切，音鋸。【說文】杖持也。【論語】據於德。　又【廣韻】依也。【易·困卦】困于石，據于蒺藜。【詩·邶風】亦有兄弟，不可以據。【左傳·僖五年】享祀豐潔，神必據我。【註】據猶安也。　又引也，援也。【爾雅疏序】事有隱滯，援據徵之。　又按也。【禮·玉藻】君賜稽首據掌，致諸地。【疏】覆左手按於右手之上也。【老子·道德經】猛獸不據。【註】以爪按拏曰據。　又拒守也。【史記·趙奢傳】先據北山上者勝。　又姓。明宣德漏刻博士據成。　又【集韻】其踞切，音遽。有形之貌。與莊子覺則蘧蘧然之蘧同。　又【史記註】訖逆切，音戟。【呂后紀】見物如蒼犬，據高后掖。又叶求於切，音蘧。【史記·龜筴傳】事有所疾，亦有所徐。物有所拘，亦有所據。　通作据。見据字註。

according to
Basic explanation of words
according to
jù
according to
jū

according to
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jù］
["Guangyun" stays in Yu cut, goes to Yu, see. ]
"Accus 2" in traditional characters.
(1) Rely on and obey.
(2) According to, based on.
(3) Ding and An.
(4) Press and hold.
(5) Evidence.
(6) Refers to credentials. That is, the written document used as proof.
(7) Possess, occupy, be in.
(8) Reject.
(9) Cross; squat.
(10) Indeed.
(11) Ancient Indian unit of length. Approximately ten miles in the Jin Dynasty.
(12) Last name. Obviously well-founded. See "Continued History · Clan Seven".
[②]［jǐ］
Fight; claw hold.
according to
